duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage existing business and analyze customer needs to sell excess products and maximize sales margins for poultry products.
Develop and implement strategic growth plans for food services, wholesale markets, and value-add processing.
Analyze sales growth for competitive opportunities and implement initiatives.
Resolve customer service issues and investigate customer claims.
Enter customer orders into the system and act as a liaison between customers, Sales Managers, and logistics and operations personnel.
Maintain customer focus, relationships, and satisfaction across the customer base.
Create and deliver presentations for sales initiatives and pricing adjustments to both internal and external customers.
Identify new customers, develop new opportunities, and partner with the sales team.
Serve as a resource for Sales Account Managers in customer relations and pricing, and facilitate issue resolution.
Wear personal protective equipment in required areas and perform additional relevant duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent; some college work preferred
